alert.note: Alert for Borden; Dawson; Martin (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 11 at 4:18AM CDT until May 11 at 5:15AM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Midland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Borden County in western Texas... Northern Martin County in western Texas... Eastern Dawson County in western Texas... * Until 515 AM CDT. * At 418 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles east of O`Donnell to 16 miles northwest of Lenorah, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ackerly, Los Ybanez, Sparenberg, Tenmile, Patricia, Key and Klondike. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Midland.
